details.title: Mathematical model of extrinsic blood coagulation cascade dynamic system
details.abstract: The blood coagulation system is very important to life. This paper presents a mathematical blood coagulation model for the extrinsic pathway. This model simulates clotting factor VIII which plays an important role in the coagulation mechanism. The mathematical model is used to study the equilibrium stability orbit structure attractors and global stability behavior with conclusions in accordance with the physiological phenomena. Moreover the results provide information about blood related illnesses which can be used for further study of the coagulation mechanism.
